jobs.title: Interview preparation support - Engineering at Cambridge (3 hours online)
jobs.job_text:
This job was auto-created after the client submitted an enquiry. 3 hours total - **4x45 minutes**.

Please note that interview packages may be shared between **two or more tutors**, and individual interview sessions are **45 minutes** (30 mins interview, 15 mins discussion).

This job will be paid at tutor's default rate.

jobs.title: ONLINE Interview Afternoon- Tuesday 5th November 1pm onwards
jobs.job_text:
We are currently looking for a tutor to interview Economics, Law and E&M Applicants. The interviews will be from 1pm, on Tuesday 5th November. 
Each interview will be 25 minutes long, with 5 minutes for feedback. 
Pay will be your hourly fee + £5 per interview feedback form completed.

jobs.title: Deliver a One Day Intensive 'Teach the Teacher' Course for Doctors
jobs.job_text: We are looking for a medical doctor to deliver a full day online teach the teacher (AKA 'Train the Trainer') course for current junior/resident doctors. We'll give you plenty of teaching material and you'll have total freedom in delivering the course. You must hold a valid GMC registration and have a liscence to practice medicine in the UK. Course dates: 10,17,24th November.
